name: AutoSwitchTouchpanel
description: 打开需要软件时修改性能模式，杀软件后关闭
condition: if (frontPkgChanged == true && globalVarOf$game.contains(to)) {ui.showShortToast("enter game");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("echo 1 > /proc/touchpanel/game_switch_enable"));} else if (pkgKilled == true && globalVarOf$game.contains(pkgName)) { ui.showShortToast("exit game");ui.showShortToast("" + su.exe("echo 0 > /proc/touchpanel/game_switch_enable"));}
